title: Ninja Training!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Hey, hey, Nicocchi, let’s go do ninja training!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>What!? What are you talking about?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>I want to go do ninja training with you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Ninja training...... What do you mean? And why do you want Nico to come with you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Because you’re right in front of me......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Hold on! You should have said something like, “I believe Nico has what it takes to be a ninja!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha, I just thought Nicocchi would be up for anything! There’s a place called Ninja Park in Odaiba. There’s a difficult obstacle course that even the most athletic challengers struggle to clear. Since you have what it takes to be a ninja, do you want to try clearing the course?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Well, Nico is confident in her physical strength...... Let’s do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hooray! Alright, let’s get going~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Nico will show you her ninja talents!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
